languages.text: "Я буду замыкать отряд, чтобы никто не отстал. А ты поведешь их вперед. Покажи им пример отваги и бесстрашия!"
"I will bring up the rear and make sure no one falls behind. You will lead the charge. Act as a shining example of duty and valour!"
languages.original_text: "Я буду замыкать отряд, чтобы никто не отстал. А ты поведешь их вперед. Покажи им пример отваги и бесстрашия!"

traits.locale_text: "I will bring up the rear and make sure no one falls behind. You will lead the charge. Show them an example of confidence and valour!"
"I will bring up the rear and make sure no one falls behind. You will lead the charge. Show them an example of confidence and valour!"
"I will bring up the rear and make sure no one falls behind. You will lead the charge. Show them an example of confidence and valour!"
"I will bring up the rear and make sure no one falls behind. You will lead the charge. Show them an example of confidence and valour!"
"I will bring up the rear and make sure no one falls behind. You will lead the charge. Act as a shining example of duty and valour!"

languages.text: “我要负责殿后，确保没有人掉队。而你身为光辉的榜样，你肩负着职责与勇气，你要负责带头冲锋！”
languages.original_text: "I will bring up the rear and make sure no one falls behind. You will lead the charge. Act as a shining example of duty and valour!"

traits.locale_text: “我要负责殿后，确保没有人掉队。而你身为光辉的榜样，你肩负着职责与勇气，你要负责带头冲锋！”

languages.text: 「私は行きそびれる者がいないように後方にいます。先導はあなたに任せます。聖務と勇気に満ちた模範として行動してください！」
languages.original_text: "I will bring up the rear and make sure no one falls behind. You will lead the charge. Act as a shining example of duty and valour!"

traits.locale_text: 「私は行きそびれる者がいないように後方にいます。先導はあなたに任せます。聖務と勇気に満ちた模範として行動してください！」

languages.text: «Yo seré la retaguardia y me aseguraré de que nadie se queda atrás. Usted liderará la carga. ¡Sea todo un adalid del deber y el valor!».
languages.original_text: "I will bring up the rear and make sure no one falls behind. You will lead the charge. Act as a shining example of duty and valour!"

traits.locale_text: «Yo seré la retaguardia y me aseguraré de que nadie se queda atrás. Usted liderará la carga. ¡Sea todo un adalid del deber y el valor!».

languages.original_text: "I will bring up the rear and make sure no one falls behind. You will lead the charge. Act as a shining example of duty and valour!"

languages.text: « Je fermerai la marche pour m'assurer que tout le monde passe. Vous, vous mènerez la charge avec force et courage. Après tout, c'est à vous de montrer l'exemple ! »
languages.original_text: "I will bring up the rear and make sure no one falls behind. You will lead the charge. Act as a shining example of duty and valour!"

traits.locale_text: « Je fermerai la marche pour m'assurer que tout le monde passe. Vous, vous mènerez la charge avec force et courage. Après tout, c'est à vous de montrer l'exemple ! »

languages.text: "Ich bilde die Nachhut und achte darauf, dass keiner zurückfällt. Ihr führt den Vorstoß an. Seid ein strahlendes Beispiel an Pflichtbewusstsein und Tapferkeit!"
languages.original_text: "I will bring up the rear and make sure no one falls behind. You will lead the charge. Act as a shining example of duty and valour!"

traits.locale_text: "Ich bilde die Nachhut und achte darauf, dass keiner zurückfällt. Ihr führt den Vorstoß an. Seid ein strahlendes Beispiel an Pflichtbewusstsein und Tapferkeit!"

languages.text: "Arkanızdan gelip geride kimse kalmadığına emin olacağım. Siz önden gideceksiniz. Görev aşkı ve yiğitlikle bizlere örnek olacaksınız!"
languages.original_text: "I will bring up the rear and make sure no one falls behind. You will lead the charge. Act as a shining example of duty and valour!"

traits.locale_text: "Arkanızdan gelip geride kimse kalmadığına emin olacağım. Siz önden gideceksiniz. Görev aşkı ve yiğitlikle bizlere örnek olacaksınız!"
